block.p: Susan Helene Wempa, a daughter of Marilyn Wempa and Dr. James Wempa of Monroeville, Pa., was married yesterday to Kevin Richard Drumm, a son of Mary Drumm and Dr. Richard Drumm of Valatie, N.Y. The Rev. Thomas Richard performed the ceremony at the First Congregational Church in Nantucket, Mass.
Mr. and Mrs. Drumm, both 30, received law degrees from Harvard University, where they met.

Susan Helene Wempa, a daughter of Marilyn Wempa and Dr. James Wempa of Monroeville, Pa., was married yesterday to Kevin Richard Drumm, a son of Mary Drumm and Dr. Richard Drumm of Valatie, N.Y. The Rev. Thomas Richard performed the ceremony at the First Congregational Church in Nantucket, Mass.
Mr. and Mrs. Drumm, both 30, received law degrees from Harvard University, where they met.

The bride is a director of business development and new media at NBC in New York. She graduated from Carnegie Mellon University. Her father is a dentist in Plum, Pa. Her mother is a freelance magazine and newspaper writer.

The bridegroom is an investment banker at Goldman, Sachs & Company in New York. He graduated from Cornell. His mother teaches science at the LaSalle School in Albany. She is also a co-owner of Farms in the Hollow, a goat farm in Kinderhook, N.Y. His father, a veterinarian, is owner of the Troy Veterinary Hospital in Troy, the Latham Animal Hospital in Latham and the Drumm Veterinary Hospital in East Greenbush, N.Y. The bridegroom is a grandson of the late Willard C. Drumm, who was the New York State assemblyman from Columbia County from 1946 to 1965.
